long_description: The women's Cannondale Quick 5 bike brings together a speedy design and comfortable upright positioning, making it well-suited for cruising with friends, bike commutes, charity rides or fitness. 6061 aluminum frame features shaped chainstays and seatstays to help absorb road vibration; flat handlebar places the rider in a comfortable, upright riding position. Frame features Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology for damping road vibration. Shimano shifters and derailleurs offer easy, dependable operation throughout the 24 speeds. Linear-pull Cannondale C4 Mini-V brakes with short-reach levers offer easy speed management and clearance for fenders (sold separately). Kenda Kwick Trax tires deliver a smooth ride for city streets. Eyelets accept a rear rack for added versatility (rack not included). Specs on the Cannondale Quick 5 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: The women's Cannondale Quick 5 bike brings together a speedy design and comfortable upright positioning, making it well-suited for cruising with friends, bike commutes, charity rides or fitness.
